MConf::CPfunction

CPfunction Class Reference

This class provides the function for creating a plasma profile. More...

Detailed Description

This class provides the function for creating a plasma profile.

f(x) = g-h+(1-g+h)(1-xp)q + h(1-e-x2/w2), where 0<=x<=1,

properties: g=PF(1)/PF(0), PF(0) = 1, PF(x)>0,
Note:
don't use it directly, use CProfile instead
Examples:

cpp2for.cpp.

double PF ( double  x,
const double *  parm 
) const

PF(x) = g-h+(1-g+h)(1-xp)q + h(1-e-x2/w2), where 0<=x<=1.

Parameters:
x is the abscissa, 0<=x<=1, can be reff/a.
parm is the array[5] of coefficients: g,p,q,h,w.
Returns:
function's value.
